alert.note: Alert for Allegan; Ottawa (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 2:31PM EDT until July 26 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Allegan County in southwestern Michigan... Ottawa County in southwestern Michigan... * Until 315 PM EDT. * At 231 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles southwest of Grand Haven to 6 miles west of Saugatuck, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Holland... Grand Haven... Hudsonville... Zeeland... Coopersville... Saugatuck... Beechwood... Jenison... Holland SP... Allendale... Dorr... Conklin... Hamilton... Wright... Douglas... Port Sheldon... Lamont... Grand Haven Memorial... Drenthe... Castle Park... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
